mapper.select: select order_id AS orderId, spot_name AS orderSpotname, order_total AS orderTotal, order_status AS orderStatus, order_createtime AS orderCreatetime, order_usetime AS orderUsetime, t_order.spot_id AS spotId from t_order, t_spot WHERE t_order.spot_id = t_spot.spot_id and t_order.user_id = ${id}
